long_description: Get the men's Speedtuck Sunglasses from VonZipper and pair technical performance with next-generation style. Navy Satin frames have Galactic Glo lenses that block 90% of visible light. Polycarbonate lenses are lightweight, virtually shatterproof and block 100% of harmful UV rays. Grilamid(R) lightweight nylon frames remain flexible at any temperature and are extremely impact resistant. VonZipper Speedtuck Sunglasses have protective lens coatings to resist water, smudging, scratching and impact. Rubber nose and temple pads grip securely and stay on even when you're playing hard. Stainless-steel hinges; corrosion-free pop 'n lock cam hinges.
short_description: Get the men's Speedtuck Sunglasses from VonZipper and pair technical performance with next-generation style.
